name: ground-truth-mcp
description: MCP server that lets AI agents validate their own claims by checking real endpoints, counting market competitors, and testing hypotheses against live data.
author: anish632

tools.name: check_endpoint
tools.description: Probe a URL/API endpoint and report status, auth requirements, response time, content type, and sample response.

tools.name: estimate_market
tools.description: Search npm or PyPI and return total count, top results with versions and activity signals.

tools.name: check_pricing
tools.description: Fetch a pricing page and extract price points, plan names, and free tier availability.

tools.name: compare_competitors
tools.description: Compare two or more npm/PyPI packages side-by-side with version, description, and metadata.

tools.name: verify_claim
tools.description: Cross-reference a factual claim against multiple live sources using keyword matching.

tools.name: test_hypothesis
tools.description: Test a factual claim against live data with structured pass/fail tests and an overall verdict.
